title: x/build/builder: json unmarshal error when server returns a failure
body:
I am seeing the following message on the NetBSD-amd64-bsiegert builder:

2012/10/15 08:14:29 json unmarshal
"{\"Response\":{\"Kind\":\"build-go-commit\",\"Data\":null},\"Error\":\"Canceled:
Deadline exceeded\"}\n": json: cannot unmarshal null into Go value of type
struct { Hash string }
2012/10/15 08:14:29 json: cannot unmarshal null into Go value of type struct { Hash
string }

The builder runs with -commit.

Operating system is:
NetBSD domU-12-31-39-0B-D9-DA.compute-1.internal 6.0_RC1 NetBSD 6.0_RC1 (XEN3_DOMU) amd64

go version devel +8209534dab87 Wed Oct 10 18:09:23 2012 +0400
